channel.title: Languages on Brodie Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Languages on Brodie Blog

item.title: Korean
item.description: Lauralee would like to go on a trip to Seoul sometime, and I was at Freeman's with Jess and Craig, and they were talking about a trip to visit Kyle sometime. I decided to start learning a bit of Korean now, and see how functional I can get it by then. I've been at it for about a month now, and so far I feel like it's been my most efficient language learning venture so far!
